inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Dagger', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Short Sword', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Small Swords
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with daggers and short swords.
